description:
Located in East Orange, New Jersey, the law firm of Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law provides a comprehensive range of quality, professional legal counsel and services to clients across Essex County and the surrounding areas who are dealing with complex, pressing issues involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal defense as well as DUI defense and traffic violations defense

Over the course of our more than 86 years in practice, our law firm has become a staple of our community, and with additional offices in Paterson and Mahwah, we serve clients throughout our region who seek the highest level of representation possible for their serious legal challenges. Backed by more than 25 years of legal experience, attorney Gregory M. Jachts currently leads our practice, and he possesses the extensive skills and resources required to handle your matter efficiently.

From our efforts, we have achieved remarkable success advocating for our clients both inside and outside the courtroom, and we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients and disabled workers. In addition, we have obtained numerous dismissals, acquittals and reductions of charge for our clients accused of a wide range of serious criminal offenses.

Whether we are working to get the money you need following a preventable tragedy or helping you fight the criminal charges you face, you can rely on us for to provide unmatched counsel and aggressive advocacy at all turns to help improve the likelihood you will obtain your goals and the positive outcome you seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

To begin the process, you can contact Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times so that you do not have to risk your health and safety to speak with us.
